content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. Can I get your name to get started with scheduling your appointment?
Thank you, Mia. Could you provide your address so we can check availability in your area?
I’m at 28729 Spruce Ave, Mills Junction.
Great, thanks! I’ll check if we service your location.

Hi Mia, this is Sarah with XYZ Home Services. Unfortunately, your address at 28729 Spruce Ave, Mills Junction is just outside our current service area. I’m really sorry—right now we’re not able to send a technician to that location. If you have any other questions or need a referral, let me know!
reason: Customer out of service area. Operator declined service.
